effect.Name: Multiplication With Hyperbolic Sinus
effect.description: Multiplication With Hyperbolic Sinus - Shader multiplies colors of base and blend with each other then colors are calculated by hyperbolic sinus
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Multiplication With Hyperbolic Sinus (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader multiplies colors of base and blend with each other then colors are calculated by hyperbolic sinus

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
